name: illuvinati-council
author: andytcf
description: Implementation of the ERC721 standard to create a custom DAO owned NFT

scripts.dist: truffle-flattener ./contracts/IlluvinatiCouncil.sol > IlluvinatiCouncil.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize IlluvinatiCouncil.full.sol && mv IlluvinatiCouncil_full_sol_IlluvinatiCouncil.bin IlluvinatiCouncil.full.bin && mv IlluvinatiCouncil_full_sol_IlluvinatiCouncil.abi IlluvinatiCouncil.full.abi && rm *_sol_*
